form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ORDER TO SHOW CAUSE AND PROCESSING SHEET

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 Form 1-265 (Rev. 2-1-71) Y (RELATING FORM 1-213 MUST BE ATTACHED) APPLICATION FOR ORDER TO SHOW CAUSE AND PROCESSING SHEET Name Mr. Silverio BARRIOS-Ureno Office File 325 Juliana St. A19 915 238 Address: Anaheim, California Los Angeles Date FACTUAL ALLEGATIONS 8/20/72 1. You are not a citizen or national of the United States 2. You are a native of MEXICO and a citizen of MEXICO 3. You entered the United States at San Ysidro, California on July 10,1971 ; 4. (Date) 5. 4. You were then entering for the purpose of working and remaining in the United States Attorney of Record You did not then possess or present a immigrant visa; Supporting evidence (briefly item Nov have never been admitted into the United States for I-213 permanent residence I-210 The undersigned recommends: V/D without OSC XOSC Charge(s) (Code) RAZEZ (Page No.) Trial Attorney Interpreter SPANISH (Language) Prosecution Violation W/A For the following reasons: SUBJECT failed to depart or to appear for a hearing Signature Above recommendation approved: R.9. young Title Investigator (Date) (Sign ature) (Title) (Office) Approved as to legal sufficiency: (Date) (Signature) (Title) (Office) OSC Iss.
